snippet: In 1½ weeks, Peyton Manning will become only the third quarterback to start for two franchises in the Super Bowl. The first guy to do it, Craig Morton, is among the thousands of former players suing the NFL about concussions....

headline.print_headline: Pre-Peyton, Morton QB'd 2 SB Teams: Dallas, Denver
headline.main: Pre-Peyton, Morton QB'd 2 SB Teams: Dallas, Denver

lead_paragraph: In 1½ weeks, Peyton Manning will become only the third quarterback to start for two franchises in the Super Bowl. The first guy to do it, Craig Morton, is among the thousands of former players suing the NFL about concussions.
